mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_NUM, U.USER_NM, (SELECT DEPT_PID FROM DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_ID LIKE U.DEPT_CD) AS PDEPT_CD, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_ID LIKE (SELECT DEPT_PID FROM DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_ID LIKE U.DEPT_CD)) AS PDEPT_NM, U.DEPT_CD, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_ID LIKE U.DEPT_CD) AS DEPT_NM, U.GRADE_CD, (SELECT SYS_ITEM_NAME FROM SYSCODE_DETAIL WHERE SYS_ITEM_CD LIKE U.GRADE_CD) AS GRADE_NM, U.ENTER_DT, U.BIRTHDAY, U.EMAIL, U.PHONE_NUM, (SELECT dbo.FN_COMMON_NM('USE', U.USE_YN)) AS USE_YN, U.AUTH_TYPE_CD, (SELECT AUTH_TYPE_NAME FROM AUTH_TYPE_HEAD WHERE AUTH_TYPE_CD = U.AUTH_TYPE_CD) AS AUTH_TYPE_NAME, U.MEMO FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.USER_ID LIKE '%' + #{USER_ID} + '%' AND U.USER_NM LIKE '%' + #{USER_NM} + '%' ORDER BY U.USER_NM;

SELECT DISTINCT D.DEPT_PID, (SELECT SYS_ITEM_NAME FROM SYSCODE_DETAIL WHERE SYS_CLASS_CD LIKE 'DEPT' AND SYS_ITEM_CD = D.DEPT_PID) AS DEPT_PNM, D.DEPT_ID, (SELECT SYS_ITEM_NAME FROM SYSCODE_DETAIL WHERE SYS_CLASS_CD LIKE 'DEPT' AND SYS_ITEM_CD = D.DEPT_ID) AS DEPT_NM FROM DEPT_INFO D LEFT OUTER JOIN SYSCODE_DETAIL S ON S.SYS_CLASS_CD = 'DEPT' AND S.SYS_ITEM_CD = D.DEPT_ID AND S.USE_YN LIKE 'Y' WHERE S.SYS_ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' + #{DEPT_NM} + '%' AND D.USE_YN LIKE 'Y';
SELECT AUTH_TYPE_CD, AUTH_TYPE_NAME FROM AUTH_TYPE_HEAD WHERE AUTH_TYPE_CD LIKE '%' + #{AUTH_TYPE_CD} + '%' AND USE_YN = 'Y';
mapper.insert: INSERT USER_INFO (USER_ID, PASSWORD, USER_NUM,USER_NM, PDEPT_CD, DEPT_CD, GRADE_CD, ENTER_DT, AUTH_TYPE_CD, USE_YN, EMAIL, PHONE_NUM, BIRTHDAY, MEMO, REG_ID, REG_DT) VALUES (#{USER_ID}, #{PASSWORD}, #{USER_NUM}, #{USER_NM}, #{PDEPT_CD}, #{DEPT_CD}, #{GRADE_CD}, #{ENTER_DT}, #{AUTH_TYPE_CD}, #{USE_YN}, #{EMAIL}, #{PHONE_NUM}, #{BIRTHDAY}, #{MEMO}, #{REG_USERID}, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), getdate(), 121));
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_NM = #{USER_NM}, USER_NUM = #{USER_NUM}, PDEPT_CD = #{PDEPT_CD}, DEPT_CD = #{DEPT_CD}, GRADE_CD = #{GRADE_CD}, ENTER_DT = #{ENTER_DT}, AUTH_TYPE_CD = #{AUTH_TYPE_CD}, USE_YN = #{USE_YN}, EMAIL = #{EMAIL}, PHONE_NUM = #{PHONE_NUM}, BIRTHDAY = #{BIRTHDAY}, MEMO = #{MEMO}, UPT_ID = #{REG_USERID}, UPT_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), GETDATE(), 121) WHERE USER_ID LIKE #{USER_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOLIDAY_INFO(USER_ID, HOLIDAY_TOTAL, HOLIDAY_USE, HOLIDAY_REMAIN, HOLIDAY_DEDUCT, REG_ID, REG_DT) VALUES(#{USER_ID}, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, #{REG_USERID}, GETDATE());
